definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: The abundance stuff a man is ashamed of the abundance respectable he is.
sentences.chinese: 一獨立個體引以爲恥的事件越多，就越可尊敬。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang is a valued elder.
sentences.chinese: 張先生是一位可尊敬的長者。

sentences.english: I'm afraid our worthy friends won't help us.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我們那些可尊敬的朋友不會幫助我們的。

sentences.english: Don' t talk to a respectable head nurse like that.
sentences.chinese: 不要對一個可尊敬的護士長那樣講話。

definition: to be advanced in both years and virtue (idiom)
to angle for fame (idiom)/to fish for compliments
to admire/to revere/to look up to
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant
a person of virtue and prestige/a person of good moral standing and reputation
